sentences.sContent: They found him lying prostrate on the floor.
sentences.sCn: 他们发现他趴在地板上。

sentences.sContent: They prostrated themselves before their king.
sentences.sCn: 他们向他们的国王跪拜行礼。

synos.tran: 俯卧的；拜倒的；降伏的；沮丧的

trans.tranOther: lying on your front with your face towards the ground

trans.tranCn: 使下跪鞠躬， 使拜服
trans.tranOther: If you prostrate yourself, you lie down flat on the ground, on your front, usually to show respect for God or a person in authority
